item.title: Ravenmea add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description:
"Inside me is the same desperate hope I have watching the ravenous dead and thinking, Oh please, oh please, oh please.
The craving inside of me is to be clutched at by some dead girl. To put my ear to her chest and hear nothing. Even getting munched on by zombies beats the idea that I'm only flesh and blood, skin and bone. Demon or angel or evil spirit, I just need something to show itself. Ghoulie or ghosty or long-legged beastie, I just want my hand held." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Ravenmea add a quote by tim burton
item.description:
"But she knows she has a curse on her, a curse she cannot win. For if someone gets too close to her,
the pins stick further in." -- tim burton

item.title: Ravenmea add a quote by Tim Burton
item.description: "Stick Boy liked Match Girl, He liked her a lot. He liked her cute figure, he thought she was hot. But could a flame ever burn for a match and a stick? It did quite literally; he burned up quick." -- Tim Burton

item.title: Ravenmea add a quote by Tim Burton
item.description: "One person's craziness is another person's reality." -- Tim Burton

item.title: Ravenmea add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "Friends don't count the cost of favors." -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Ravenmea add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Most books on witchcraft will tell you that witches work naked. This is because most books on witchcraft were written by men." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Ravenmea add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Things need not have happened to be true. Tales and dreams are the shadow-truths that will endure when mere facts are dust and ashes, and forgot." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Ravenmea add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Ravenmea add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ravenmea add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ravenmea add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ravenmea add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Anyone who lives within their means suffers from a lack of imagination." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ravenmea add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "You can never be overdressed or overeducated." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ravenmea add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The truth is rarely pure and never simple." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ravenmea add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "You will always be fond of me. I represent to you all the sins you never had the courage to commit." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ravenmea add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Only dull people are brilliant at breakfast." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ravenmea add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The books that the world calls immoral are books that show the world its own shame." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ravenmea add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Yes: I am a dreamer. For a dreamer is one who can only find his way by moonlight, and his punishment is that he sees the dawn before the rest of the world." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ravenmea add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Ravenmea add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ravenmea add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ravenmea add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ravenmea add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Sometimes the questions are complicated and the answers are simple." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ravenmea add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Ravenmea add a quote by Marthe Troly-Curtin
item.description: "Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time." -- Marthe Troly-Curtin

item.title: Ravenmea add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "It is amazing how complete is the delusion that beauty is goodness." -- Leo Tolstoy
